record.id: field.name="alt.application" and file.name="validity" and term=NULL and format.name=NULL and syslanguage="en"
record.field.name: alt.application
record.file.name: validity

brief.brief: An alternate RAD application to run in place of the standard Validity table processing.

detail.detail: This alternate application must perform all processing necessary to validate the data field.
Ensure that the variables used in the alternate application do not corrupt variables used by Validity processing.
If variables are corrupted, the results of validity processing are unpredictable.
The normal exit causes Validity processing to continue to the next field in the list.
The error exit causes Validity processing to return to the data record it is validating.
